About Us
Greetings!
Miracle Educational Institutes cordially invites all the Eamcet students to come along with their parents and be a part of the College Visit Program which is organized specially for you. This will greatly help you and your parents in knowing the best scope and fields of your educational career. We also have an interactive seminar session by our highly qualified experts, who will give a brief idea on Web Counseling and Career Opportunities in all engineering branches.
Are you worried about the transportation and food? You don't have to worry about it! As we have taken total care of it, we have arranged food and transportation facilities for you and your parents. The college visit program will be held on 5th June, 2017 (Monday). You can experience the latest infrastructure of our college and interact with our faculty of different branches to gain the best career guidance.
